title: FORCE (FOR) Market Cap Achieves $2.57 Million
content: FORCE (CURRENCY:FOR) traded down 0.7% against the U.S. dollar during the 24-hour period ending at 17:00 PM Eastern on June 2nd. One FORCE coin can now be purchased for about $0.0208 or 0.00000273 BTC on cryptocurrency exchanges including CryptoBridge and Stocks.Exchange. In the last seven days, FORCE has traded down 2.5% against the U.S. dollar. FORCE has a market capitalization of $2.57 million and $3,233.00 worth of FORCE was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours.    Here is how other cryptocurrencies have performed in the last 24 hours:    Pandacoin (PND) traded 8.2% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.0002 or 0.00000002 BTC.  HiCoin (XHI) traded 3.7% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0008 or 0.00000010 BTC.  DraftCoin (DFT) traded up 4.4% against the dollar and now trades at $0.14 or 0.00001830 BTC.  Universe (UNI) traded up 6.8% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0352 or 0.00000462 BTC.  Zennies (ZENI) traded up 15.2% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0007 or 0.00000009 BTC.  Ultimate Secure Cash (USC) traded 43.9% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.0317 or 0.00000416 BTC.   FORCE Coin Profile     FORCE is a proof-of-stake (PoS) coin that uses the  Scrypt hashing algorithm. It launched on October 26th, 2017. FORCE’s total supply is 126,794,083 coins and its circulating supply is 123,192,742 coins. FORCE’s official website is www.forcenetwork.io . FORCE’s official Twitter account is @force_coin . The Reddit community for FORCE is /r/forcenetwork and the currency’s Github account can be viewed here .  Buying and Selling FORCE    FORCE can be traded on these cryptocurrency exchanges: CryptoBridge and Stocks.Exchange. It is usually not presently possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as FORCE directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to trade FORCE should first buy Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as Gemini, Coinbase or Changelly. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to buy FORCE using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
